I have experience in the business side of IT, where I have spent 2 years working through multiple organizations defining requirements and ensuring the completion of projects. I have experience in Power BI, Figma, CMS, SQL, web interface design, usability research, and various other data-driven tools that will help your organization succeed.
Outside of my IT career, I am a musician in various bands and love to DJ.
